overview: Irresponsible and extravagant, Ranjit Bawa finds himself in a spot of bother when his family withholds his inheritance until he gets married. His search for a suitable bride brings him to Jassi Gill, a marriage bureau owner whose plight is somewhat similar and equally bad. Realising that they have a lot in common, the two men team up to sort out each other's issues, and things take a hilariously interesting turn from this point.
title: Mr. & Mrs. 420 Returns
